subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Far from expressing the joy of thrashing its neighbor, José Mourinho lectured the media. And far from conceding anything after a loss, Pep Guardiola said he remains proud of his players.
snippet: Far from expressing the joy of thrashing its neighbor, José Mourinho lectured the media. And far from conceding anything after a loss, Pep Guardiola said he remains proud of his players.
